definitions.definition: to kiss, hold, and touch someone in a sexual way:
examples: Didn't I see you smooching with Mark at Kim's party?

definitions.definition: When two people are smooching, they are dancing slowly and very close together to slow, romantic music:
examples: The dance floor was full of middle-aged couples smooching to slushy ballads.
I was so embarrassed when I walked in on them having a smooch on the sofa.
Kate had a smooch with a very attractive young man at the Christmas party.
